title: Berniceâ€™s Chocolate Chip Cream Cheese Filled Cupcakes
directions: Combine filling ingredients and beat until smooth, adding the chocolate chips last. Set aside. For the batter, sift the dry ingredients together, adding all liquids after. Mix until smooth, adding more water if necessary. Fill cupcake pans 2/3 of the way full and then top with a teaspoon of filling. Bake at 350 degrees for 25-30 minutes.
